title: Emerald & Diamond Mango Mala - Mesmerizing Mogali Rekulu Haaram
materials: Faceted Emerald Green Simulated Stones. Features a Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: Classic Mango Mala design featuring alternating floral and paisley (Mogali Rekulu) motifs. The floral motifs are intricately embellished with Cubic Zirconia stones. The Pendant in the center is beautifully crafted in a paisley shape and is decorated with cubic zirconia and a simulated emerald green stone. The detailed filigree work and precise stone setting demonstrate superior craftsmanship.
occasions: and traditional South Indian ceremonies like Seemantham
and Half-Saree Function (Pelli sambaralu). Also suitable for formal events and sophisticated evening wear.
description: This Mango Mala combines traditional Telugu jewelry design with modern sparkle. The high-quality gold plating ensures durability and a luxurious look. The brilliant Cubic Zirconia stones mimic the shimmer of real diamonds, creating a striking statement piece. The deep emerald green accents add a touch of regal elegance, making it a cherished heirloom.
